sentence.Network_en: The deal ended after a series of rancorous disputes.
sentence.Network_cn: 经过一连串充满敌意的争吵，交易泡汤了。

sentence.Network_en: He had long since wearied of discussing the rancorous subject.
sentence.Network_cn: 他早就厌倦这类怨气冲冲的话题了.

sentence.Network_en: His speech was a bilious, rancorous attack on young people.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的讲话是对年轻人满怀敌意的狂暴攻击。

list.abs: we must joincommon effort , without remorse or recrimination , without anger or rancor .我们必须一同努力，没有懊悔或责备，也没有愤怒或仇恨。
...宫殿解救被捕的汉·索罗的计划的组成，首先派去那两个机器人，然后卢克去要求赫特人贾巴释放汉·索罗。贾巴拒绝了，并把卢克弄去和他那可憎的斗兽兰苛(the rancor)战斗。接下来卢克，汉·索罗和楚巴卡被判处死刑，到卡库因(Carkoon)深坑执行。在那里，R2把卢克的武器掷给他，天行.
He have no rancor at heart against you ., 他心中对你并无怨恨.
and yet an alliance between the PPP and PML ( Q ) , with the prime ministership going to the party that won the election , would also be rancorous .人民党和领袖派的结盟将赢得大选，并获得总理职位，然而他们之间同样充满敌意。

entry.tran: 怀有深仇的；充满敌意的
entry.def: A rancorous argument or person is full of bitterness and anger.

example.ex: The deal ended after a series of rancorous disputes.
example.tran: 经过一连串充满敌意的争吵，交易泡汤了。
